bind.relevant: /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/convulstions = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/fainting = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_irritation = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_bleeding = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/abdomen_pain = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/high_temp = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/other_signs = 'yes'

((/data/case_opv0 != "yes" and /data/visit_questions/vaccinations/opv0 != "yes") or (/data/case_bcg != "yes" and /data/visit_questions/vaccinations/bcg != "yes")) and today() <= date(date(/data/case_dob) + 14)

/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/high_temp = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/abdomen_pain = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_bleeding = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_irritation = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/fainting = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/convulstions = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/problems_breastfeeding = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/other_signs = 'yes' or /data/danger_signs = 'yes'

/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/other_signs = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/convulstions = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/fainting = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_irritation = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_bleeding = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/abdomen_pain = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/high_temp = 'yes'

bind.calculate: if(/data/visit_success = "yes", date(min(int(/data/next_visit_normal), int(/data/next_visit_first_vaccines), int(/data/next_visit_high_risk), int(/data/next_visit_attend_pnc))), date(/data/case_next_visit))

if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 0, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 1), if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 2, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 3 - 1), if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 5, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 7 - 1), if((today() - date(/data/case_dob)) < 21, date(date(/data/case_dob) + 28 - 3), date(date(/data/case_dob) + 112 - 7)))))

if((/data/case_opv0 != "yes" and /data/visit_questions/vaccinations/opv0 != "yes" and (today() <= date(date(/data/case_dob) + 14))) or (/data/case_bcg != "yes" and /data/visit_questions/vaccinations/bcg != "yes" and (today() <= date(date(/data/case_dob) + 14))), date(today() + 7), date(date(/data/case_dob) + 730))

if(/data/visit_questions/high_risk = "yes" and today() <= (date(/data/case_dob) + 30), date(today() + 3), if(/data/visit_questions/high_risk = "yes" and today() > (date(/data/case_dob) + 30), date(today() + 30), date(date(/data/case_dob) + 730)))

concat( if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/high_temp = "yes", "high temperature, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_bleeding = "yes", "vaginal bleeding, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_irritation = "yes", "vaginal discharge or irritation, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/abdomen_pain = "yes", "abdominal pain, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/fainting = "yes", "fainting, dizziness or tiredness, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/convulstions = "yes", "convulsions or rigidity, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/other_signs = "yes", "other", ""))

concat( if(/data/visit_questions/breastfeeding_problems/pain_breastfeeding = "yes", "pain, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/breastfeeding_problems/low_milk = "yes", "low milk, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/breastfeeding_problems/cracked_nipples = "yes", "cracked nipples, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/breastfeeding_problems/breast_infection = "yes", "infection, ", ""), if(/data/visit_questions/breastfeeding_problems/baby_refuses = "yes", "baby refuses or cries", ""))

if(/data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/convulstions = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/fainting = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_irritation = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/vaginal_bleeding = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/abdomen_pain = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/high_temp = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/mother_danger_signs/other_signs = 'yes', 'yes', 'no')

if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/has_fever = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/fast_breathing = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/vomit = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/convulsions = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/chest_indrawing = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/not_feeding = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/unconscious = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/infected_cord = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/skin_pustules = 'yes' or /data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/other_danger_sign = 'yes', 'yes', 'no')

concat(if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/has_fever = 'yes', 'fever, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/fast_breathing = 'yes', 'cough with fast breathing, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/vomit = 'yes', 'vomit, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/convulsions = 'yes', 'convulsions, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/chest_indrawing = 'yes', 'chest in-drawing, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/not_feeding = 'yes', 'not able to breastfeed or drink, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/unconscious = 'yes', 'sleepy or unconscious, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/infected_cord = 'yes', 'infected umbilical cord, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/skin_pustules = 'yes', 'many skin pustules, ', ''), if(/data/visit_questions/child_evaluation/danger_signs_group/other_danger_sign = 'yes', 'other danger signs', ''))

How long since mother first noticed symptoms?
Amulembe a pepa lya "ku gusya mwana"
Mwana wakanyonka kunkolo kakutanainda woola lyomwe lyakutumbukwa?
4. Mwana watumbukwa a myezi ita kkwene (Kana nkaniini)?
5. Kutumbuka kwatola kaindi(kwiinda a mawoola ali 12)?
6. Nsuwa yazwa mwida kamutamyongi na kucisa
7. Cakabo ticakazwa mu mamiti ali 30 kwazwide kale mwana
Sena mwana ulantenda kapati mbuli kutalema, utakwene myezi na wakazwalwa a bulema

5. Kusuntauka, kuzima kumeso na kumvwa kukatala kapati
Mutumbu ulazitondezyo zya ntenda alimwi welede kutuminwa ku cibbadela CAKUFWAMBAANA

Mutumbu ula buyumu-yumu bwakunyosha alimwi welede kutuminwa ku cibbadela
Kulema kwamwana kulilembedwe mu cipepa cacipimo camwana?
Sena mwana takwe cimbi ncalya kunza kwakunyonka kunkolo?
Sena ulayoya kwiinda mu miniti yomwe?
5. Lukombo kombo luboneka kusalala na kuzwa busina?
Mwana ulazintondezyo zya ntenda alimwi welede kutuminwa kucibbadela CAKUFWAMBANA
Mwana ubikkwa camba cabanyna ciindi cinji?
Bausi na usalidwe kugwasya waliko mukuswaya oku?
Oyu mwana ulantenda alimwi welede kuswaingwa-swaigwa
Mutumbu a mwana bayelede kuunka kucipimo ca butumbu
A mumwambila mutumbu kuti mwana uciyandika kupegwa nkwalu kwalu zintanzi zya kakweekwe a cilebulebu
Mutumbu ula mapenzi a nkolo aya:
Kainda ciindi cilibuti Mutumbu naka bona zintondezyo zyantenda zitanzi?
